text: To defeat the miners, he had to give his mercenaries a white card. When the battle came to an end, he couldn't get them out of his head. He had put the city in their hands, and he was unable to reclaim it. The gunmen liked the city and stayed there. They considered her the spoil that the boss owed them for helping him break the strike. He had to be discreet with them. They knew too much about him, and he was the one most responsible for the actions they had committed during the strike. He aborted the strike, but the city and the state escaped his hands. The end of the red harvest, 1927
title: La huelga
author: Dashiell Hammett
